publicwhip.spmotion: *S2M-4090 Stewart Stevenson: National Science Week 2006—That the Parliament notes that 10 March 2006 is the start of National Science Week which is an opportunity for people of all ages to take part in science, engineering and technology activities; further notes that Scotland has a proud history in the science and engineering sphere, ranging from John Logie Baird and Alexander Graham Bell to Alexander Fleming; hopes that National Science Week will help the next generation of Scots to become scientists and engineers, which our economy greatly relies on, and believes that more funding must go into supplying our schools with science teachers. Supported by: Mike Pringle*, Mr Andrew Welsh*, Mr Jamie Stone*, Mr Adam Ingram*, Eleanor Scott*, Jim Mather*, Michael Matheson*, Mr Stewart Maxwell*, Fergus Ewing*, Mrs Margaret Ewing*, Alex Neil*, Mr Kenny MacAskill*, Rob Gibson*, Ms Sandra White*, Shiona Baird*, Brian Adam*, Patrick Harvie*, Robin Harper*

S2M-4090 Stewart Stevenson: National Science Week 2006—That the Parliament notes that 10 March 2006 is the start of National Science Week which is an opportunity for people of all ages to take part in science, engineering and technology activities; further notes that Scotland has a proud history in the science and engineering sphere, ranging from John Logie Baird and Alexander Graham Bell to Alexander Fleming; hopes that National Science Week will help the next generation of Scots to become scientists and engineers, which our economy greatly relies on, and believes that more funding must go into supplying our schools with science teachers. Supported by: Mike Pringle, Mr Andrew Welsh, Mr Jamie Stone, Mr Adam Ingram, Eleanor Scott, Jim Mather, Michael Matheson, Mr Stewart Maxwell, Fergus Ewing, Mrs Margaret Ewing, Alex Neil, Mr Kenny MacAskill, Rob Gibson, Ms Sandra White, Shiona Baird, Brian Adam, Patrick Harvie, Robin Harper, Christine Grahame*, Mr David Davidson*
S2M-4090 National Science Week 2006 (lodged on 9 March 2006) Dr Jean Turner*, Donald Gorrie*
S2M-4090 National Science Week 2006 (lodged on 9 March 2006) Mark Ballard*
S2M-4090 National Science Week 2006 (lodged on 9 March 2006) Richard Lochhead*, Roseanna Cunningham*
S2M-4090 National Science Week 2006 (lodged on 9 March 2006) Ms Rosemary Byrne*, Linda Fabiani*
S2M-4090 National Science Week 2006 (lodged on 9 March 2006) Frances Curran*
